text: It is their pleasure to open for you, and that's just on the same latitude.

passages.fragment: It is their pleasure to open for you , and
passages.full_quote: <used>It is their pleasure to open for you, and</used> their satisfaction to close again with the knowledge of a job well done.
It will be very, very nasty <used>for you, and that's just</used> too bad

passages.fragment: , and that 's just on the same latitude
passages.full_quote: A lot of the inhabitants of New York will honk on mightily about the pleasures of spring, but if they actually knew the first thing about the pleasures of spring they would know of at least five thousand nine hundred and eighty- three better places to spend it than New York, <used>and that's just on the same latitude</used>
